alert.note: Alert for Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:07PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lyman County through 930 PM CDT... At 907 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vivian, or 14 miles west of Presho, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Vivian around 915 PM CDT. 5 Mile Corner around 925 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Presho and Fate Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
